name: spir_kill_01
text: I send you beyond this plane.
text_simple: i send you beyond this plane

name: spir_kill_04
text: Don't fret. Your worries are over.
text_simple: dont fret your worries are over

name: spir_kill_05
text: Your spirit, like your life, is broken.
text_simple: your spirit like your life is broken

name: spir_kill_06
text: You were no match for the spirit breaker.
text_simple: you were no match for the spirit breaker

name: spir_kill_07
text: Hehu, I wet my horns in you.

name: spir_kill_09
text: Death has many doors; I open one for you.

name: spir_kill_10

text_simple: mine is the anvil on which your spirit broke

name: spir_kill_12

text: I'll trample your bones to dust, skeleton.
